alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 20 at 2:24AM PDT until April 20 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Much of Douglas, Jackson, and Josephine Counties and Eastern Curry County, including Interstate 5, Highway 199, Roseburg, Medford, Grants Pass, and Cave Junction. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier showers and any thunderstorms will be the main cause of strong winds today, but winds will be lighter in between showers and storms. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
